name: Elegant-new-tab
tagline: A better New Tab for Chrome
body:
Elegant New Tab- A better New Tab for Chrome.





Installation

Elegant New Tab is live

Features

- Inspired by Material Design featuring Color Adaptive Ripple Effect
- A new background everyday or BYOB (Bring your own background)
- A new Quote every minute!
- Weather Data with CSS animations
- Top Visited Sites
- Runs Offline
- Open Source
- More Features Coming Soon

Attributions

Quote by iheartquotes
Picture of the day by Bing
Weather Data from openweathermap.com
Jquery
Jquery UI Autocomplete
Trip.js
ColorThief
Weather Animations inspired by Fabrizio Bianchi's Code Pen
Ripple Effect inspired by thecodeplayer's Code Pen
